item.title: Hello world in golang
item.description: Introduction Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software. How to write readable enums Not the most idiomatic way, but gets the job done ! package main import ( "fmt" ) type Action struct { val uint32 repr string } func (a *Action) Val() uint32 { return a.val } func (a *Action) String() string { return a.repr } var ( Read = Action{0, "Read"} Write = Action{1, "Write"} Attr = Action{2, "Attr"} ) func main() { fmt.

item.title: About
item.description: An opensource project with some nifty tools to manage osquery deployments.
